entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING ENDED, Gatineau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 07:05 AM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -1.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gatineau Airport 08:00 AM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -1.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa rising
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 96 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -2.4°C
Wind: WSW 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index:

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending early this afternoon then clearing. Risk of freezing drizzle this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 07:06 AM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 07:06 AM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023
